00001 #include "SearchStringParser.h"
00002 #include <boost/algorithm/string/trim.hpp>
00003 #include <boost/algorithm/string/classification.hpp>
00004 
00005 using namespace BibleDatabase;
00006 
00007 std::vector<std::string> SearchStringParser::parse(std::string search_string) const
00008 {
00009     std::vector<std::string> search_terms;
00010 
00011     boost::algorithm::trim(search_string);
00012     
00013     bool start_new_term = true;
00014     bool in_quoted_string = false;
00015     bool quoted_string_just_completed = false;
00016     std::string::const_iterator start_of_term;
00017     std::string::const_iterator end_of_term;
00018 
00019     std::string::const_iterator end_of_search_string = search_string.end();
00020 
00021     for (std::string::const_iterator character = search_string.begin(); character != end_of_search_string; ++character)
00022     {
00023         if (*character == '"')
00024         {
00025             if (in_quoted_string)
00026             {
00027                 end_of_term = character;
00028                 std::string term = std::string(start_of_term, end_of_term);
00029                 search_terms.push_back(term);
00030                 start_new_term = true;
00031                 quoted_string_just_completed = true;
00032             }
00033 
00034             in_quoted_string = !in_quoted_string;
00035         }
00036         else if (*character == ' ')
00037         {
00038             if (!in_quoted_string && !quoted_string_just_completed)
00039             {
00040                 end_of_term = character;
00041                 std::string term = std::string(start_of_term, end_of_term);
00042                 search_terms.push_back(term);
00043                 start_new_term = true;
00044             }
00045             
00046             quoted_string_just_completed = false;
00047         }
00048         else if ((character + 1) == end_of_search_string)
00049         {
00050             if (!in_quoted_string)
00051             {
00052                 end_of_term = character + 1;
00053                 std::string term = std::string(start_of_term, end_of_term);
00054                 search_terms.push_back(term);
00055                 break;
00056             }
00057             
00058             quoted_string_just_completed = false;
00059         }
00060         else if (start_new_term)
00061         {
00062             start_of_term = character;
00063             start_new_term = false;
00064             
00065             quoted_string_just_completed = false;
00066         }
00067 
00068     }
00069     
00070     return search_terms;
00071 }
